content.raw:
Since ogre 1.9 wasn't fully supported until gazebo5, this change is breaking the trusty build for gazebo 3.x and 4.x branches:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/450/
* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/451/
content.html:
Since ogre 1.9 wasn't fully supported until gazebo5, this change is breaking the trusty build for gazebo 3.x and 4.x branches:

  • http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/450/
  • http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/451/

content.raw:
Umm interesting. 

release-tools should branch when new gazebo (or any other software) is released. There should be branches for gazebo_3.0 or gazebo_4.0 created at the moment of releasing. We should move (click configure in the jobs and add -b gazebo_3.0). But this will work for our gazebo_4.0-devel jobs but in this case, for the any jobs, the issue is not simple.

We should find a way of handling this.

We should find a way of handling this.

content.raw:
We can identify the `GAZEBO_MAJOR_VERSION` before calling `boilerplate_prepare.sh` in `gazebo-base-default.bash`, then use that variable to choose an ogre library version in `dependencies_archive.sh`
~~~
diff -r a3907ffe7b09 jenkins-scripts/lib/gazebo-base-default.bash
--- a/jenkins-scripts/lib/gazebo-base-default.bash	Wed Jan 21 19:18:08 2015 +0100
+++ b/jenkins-scripts/lib/gazebo-base-default.bash	Thu Jan 22 11:19:09 2015 -0800
@@ -11,6 +11,11 @@
     GZ_CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE="-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${GZ_BUILD_TYPE}"
 fi
 
+# Identify GAZEBO_MAJOR_VERSION to help with dependency resolution
+GAZEBO_MAJOR_VERSION=`\
+  grep 'set.*GAZEBO_MAJOR_VERSION ' ${WORKSPACE}/gazebo/CMakeLists.txt | \
+  tr -d 'a-zA-Z _()'`
+
 . ${SCRIPT_DIR}/lib/boilerplate_prepare.sh
 
 cat > build.sh << DELIM
~~~
content.html:
We can identify the GAZEBO_MAJOR_VERSION before calling boilerplate_prepare.sh in gazebo-base-default.bash, then use that variable to choose an ogre library version in dependencies_archive.sh

diff -r a3907ffe7b09 jenkins-scripts/lib/gazebo-base-default.bash
--- a/jenkins-scripts/lib/gazebo-base-default.bash  Wed Jan 21 19:18:08 2015 +0100
+++ b/jenkins-scripts/lib/gazebo-base-default.bash  Thu Jan 22 11:19:09 2015 -0800
@@ -11,6 +11,11 @@
     GZ_CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE="-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${GZ_BUILD_TYPE}"
 fi

+# Identify GAZEBO_MAJOR_VERSION to help with dependency resolution
+GAZEBO_MAJOR_VERSION=`\
+  grep 'set.*GAZEBO_MAJOR_VERSION ' ${WORKSPACE}/gazebo/CMakeLists.txt | \
+  tr -d 'a-zA-Z _()'`
+
 . ${SCRIPT_DIR}/lib/boilerplate_prepare.sh

 cat > build.sh << DELIM
